instruction: Create a 100-word dialogue between two friends.
output:
Friend 1: Hi there! Where have you been?

Friend 2: Hey! I was away on a business trip, it was pretty hectic. But I'm glad to be back.

Friend 1: Very cool! How was it?

Friend 2: Oh, it was amazing! We had some incredible meetings and opportunities. I even got to sight-see a bit which was really nice.

Friend 1: That sounds exciting! What did you get up to?

Friend 2: Well, I visited this ancient temple that had a really interesting history. I also got to take a boat ride along the coast, it was so beautiful. I even tried some of the local cuisines.

Friend 1: Wow, that sounds like a great experience.

Friend 2: Yeah, it was incredible. I can't wait to tell you about it in more detail.
